sentences.en: As a lawyer, I would deprecate any sort of legal control on gene therapy at this stage.
sentences.cn: 作为律师，我会反对在现阶段对基因疗法进行任何形式的法律管制。

sentences.en: He deprecated the low quality of entrants to the profession.
sentences.cn: 他抨击了行业中的滥竽充数。

sentences.en: I strongly deprecate the use of violence by the students.
sentences.cn: 我强烈反对学生们使用暴力.

sentences.en: Shall we prostrate ourselves and deprecate his wrath?
sentences.cn: 我们将匍伏在地上祈求他不要发怒 吗 ?

sentences.en: So I wonder why people still look for reasons and justifications, why the even deprecate it.
sentences.cn: 因此,我疑惑是为什么人们依旧寻找理由与辩解, 为什么从未反对过这种观点.

sentences.en: Some of these, in turn , deprecate the term human resources as useless.
sentences.cn: 因此,其中也有些认为人力资源这个词语毫无用处.

sentences.en: The fashion now is to deprecate the positive contributions of Keynesian economics.
sentences.cn: 否认凯恩斯主义经济理论的积极贡献已成为当前的一种时尚.

sentences.en: The peace - loving people deprecate war.
sentences.cn: 爱好和平的人民反对战争.

sentences.en: The teacher should not deprecate his student's efforts.
sentences.cn: 老师不应该贬低自己学生的努力.

sentences.en: Though the environment doesn't have a mouth to deprecate what humans have done to her, she retaliates through action.
sentences.cn: 尽管环境没有嘴巴来反对人类对她所做的一切，她通过行动来报复。

sentences.en: You should not deprecate your own worth.
sentences.cn: 你不应该贬低你自己的价值.

words.tran_cn: 不赞成的；反对的；恳求的
对…表示不赞成；轻视（deprecate的ing形式）
反对；抨击；轻视；声明不赞成

trans.tran_cn: 反对；抨击；轻视；声明不赞成
trans.tran_en: to strongly disapprove of or criticize something
